message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your endeavors. This product, while priceless to me due to its historical significance and personal attachment, is being offered to you at a special price considering its potential value to you. I am extending this exclusive offer at a price of $15000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details.
